import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import logo from "./logo.svg"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.min.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js"; import "./App.css"; import "login.ts" const CLIENT_ID: string = "e5f9bfa9d40447488e4fc74d2c71d293"; const SPOTIFY_AUTHORIZE_ENDPOINT: string = "https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize"; const REDIRECT_URL_AFTER_LOGIN: string = "https://localhost:3000"; const SPACE_DELIMITER: string = "%20"; const SCOPES = ["playlist-read-private"]; const SCOPES_URL_PARAM = SCOPES.join(SPACE_DELIMITER); function App() { const handleLogin: React.MouseEventHandler = () => { window.location.href = `${SPOTIFY_AUTHORIZE_ENDPOINT}?client_id=${CLIENT_ID}&redirect_uri=${REDIRECT_URL_AFTER_LOGIN}&scope=${SCOPES_URL_PARAM}&response_type=token&show_dialog=true`; }; return (

); } export default App;
